heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Welcome to a journey of healing and self-discovery. In this sacred space, we invite you to explore the depths of your being, guided by the wisdom of the Amazon rainforest. Facilitated by experts in spiritual guidance, this ceremony offers a unique opportunity to cleanse, release, and reconnect with your most authentic essence.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are currently no upcoming ceremonies. Please check back later.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony. The changes will be visible to all users immediately.
addCeremonyDescription: Add a new ceremony to the list. It will be visible to all users immediately.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the 'Past Events' section.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. You can reactivate it later.
errorFinishingCeremony: Could not mark ceremony as finished.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan available for up to 3 people
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% down payment.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon used for millennia by indigenous peoples for healing and spiritual connection. It is a decoction of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of Chacruna (Psychotria viridis).
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The combination of these plants allows DMT, a powerful visionary compound present in Chacruna, to be active when ingested, leading to a profound experience of introspection, emotional cleansing, and spiritual revelation. The ceremony is a journey into the deepest corners of your being.
spiritualMasterTitle: The Plant as a Spiritual Master
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, heals, and guides. Each experience is unique and is adapted to the individual needs of each person, offering what is necessary for their growth and healing at that moment in their life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find that Ayahuasca helps to clear the mind of constant 'noise,' allowing for greater clarity, focus, and a deeper understanding of their life path.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The experience can bring repressed emotions and past traumas to the surface to be processed and released in a safe and supportive environment, leading to profound emotional healing.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Participants often report a sense of unity with the universe, a deep connection with nature, and a better understanding of their place in the world.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participate in a shared experience, where collective energy enhances individual healing. Ideal for those seeking community and shared support.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address your specific intentions in a completely private and contained environment.
guidesPageSubtitle: Guardians of the ceremony, with years of experience and a deep respect for ancestral traditions. They will accompany you with care and wisdom on your journey of transformation.
editGuideDescription: Modify the details of this guide. Your changes will be saved permanently.
mediaRequiredDescription: You must provide an image URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred plant, its benefits, and its ancestral wisdom.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guardians who will accompany you on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is the first step towards a deep and transformative experience. Discover how to align your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media and become part of a community dedicated to healing and spiritual growth. We share valuable content, ceremony dates, and testimonials.
contactTalkText: or talk to us directly at:
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You have successfully logged in.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created successfully. Welcome!
themeTabDescription: Adjust the application's color scheme (dark mode).
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin with a specific diet and mental reflection.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The night of the ceremony, where the journey inward takes place.
experienceProcessDescription: The hours of introspection, visions, and emotional release.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, the process of applying the lessons learned begins.
dietSubtitle: The 'dieta' is a fundamental part of the process, preparing your body and spirit to receive the medicine.
allowedFoodsList: White meats (chicken, fish) boiled or grilled.
Legumes and grains (lentils, chickpeas, rice, quinoa).
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass that will guide your experience. Dedicate time to reflect.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open the heart.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you seek to heal or understand. What is your purpose?
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca is a journey of profound emotional healing. It connects us with our deepest essence, helping us release burdens and traumas that we often carry unconsciously. It is an opportunity to heal relationships, forgive, and find inner peace, transforming our perception of ourselves and the world.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare to be comfortable and supported during the experience.
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the next day.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome! I am your Spiritual Guide. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access exclusive content, book ceremonies, and start your preparation journey.
tourWelcomeDescription: Before we begin a brief tour, could you provide your phone number? This will help us stay in touch about your journey.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will only use it for important communications regarding your process.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories and videos from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: This is where our next sacred encounters are. Click 'View Prices' to see details and book.
tourStepFinal: That's it! Now, let's take the first step in your preparation: the health questionnaire.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used by the guides to ensure a safe experience.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the form. Your answers have been saved. You can review them here or proceed to the preparation guide.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, especially antidepressants or psychiatric drugs?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of serious mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you seek to heal, understand, or explore...
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'yes'.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your questionnaire has been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: You are on your way to a transformative experience. We now invite you to read our preparation guide.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the application.
allUsersDescription: List of all users, their roles, and status.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete our health questionnaire to continue your process with El Arte de Sanar. It is a fundamental step for your safety and preparation. You can fill it out here: [LINK]
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review of the user's submitted health information.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire answers have been submitted by this user yet.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Dear user, we want to inform you that...
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: List of chats ordered by most recent.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
